mapper.select: Select doctor_id, doctor_name, age, phone, mail, dept_name, status, Doctors.account_id as account_id, Accounts.account as account, Accounts.type as type From Doctors Join Accounts on Doctors.account_id = Accounts.account_id Join Dept on Doctors.dept_id = Dept.dept_id Where Doctors.account_id = #{accountId};
select allowance from timeslot where doctor_id=#{id} and month_day=#{date} and time_slot=#{time} ;

select case_id, Doctors.doctor_name, Patients.patient_name, prescription, description from cases join doctors on cases.doctor_id = doctors.doctor_id join patients on cases.patient_id = patients.patient_id where cases.doctor_id=#{id};
